description: Ernesto Diaz (Writer/Director), Alfonso Moral Heimpell (Executive Producer), Alvaro Moral Heimpell (Executive Producer), Diego Moral Heimpell (Executive Producer), Gina Aguad (Executive Producer), Marko Zaror (Producer, Actor), Noah Segan (Producer, Actor), Boris Smirnow (Actor), José Luis Mosca (Actor)
synopsis: In order to atone for his past sins, he'll not only kick your ass, he'll impale your face and shred you to bits. Marko Zaror is the Redeemer!
title: Redeemer (Redentor)
